headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.auth0.com https://unpkg.com https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.auth0.com https://unpkg.com;
